audioText: Un politicien français propose de changer le nom de la langue française. "Il sait être très inventif quand il s'agit de se rendre désagréable"
question: What does the speaker say about the politician's proposal?
options: He wants to change the French language grammar
He proposed changing the name of the French language
He wants to make French easier to learn
He suggested creating a new French dialect
explanation: The politician 'propose de changer le nom de la langue française' - proposes to change the name of the French language. The quote criticizes him as being 'inventive when it comes to making himself unpleasant.'
